name: The Collapse
description:
The Collapse is a bullet-hell roguelike set in a 1920’s perfect future, full of wonder, progression and space exploration.

Forge your own path in an ever shrinking universe amidst a war with newfound malevolent forces, but prepare yourself for difficult decisions, insanity and a whole lot of death.

There are three main factions within the universe;

The alliance - The interplanetary civilization who you work for.

The rebels - A rogue group who believe in an decentralized society.

The aliens - The malevolent forces who endeavour to devour everything.
